31130.name: Wallace & Gromit’s Grand Adventures, Episode 4: The Bogey Man
31130.description:
Wallace has been admitted to Prickly Thicket, the oldest country club in Lancashire. Wallace and his faithful caddie Gromit get wrapped up in a decades-old club dispute that threatens to destroy their peaceful West Wallaby lifestyle, and the duo must fight to save the neighborhood they hold dear!


Enter the colorful world of West Wallaby Street in a series of four comedy games brought to you by Aardman Animations, the creators of the Wallace & Gromit animated films, and Telltale, the award-winning studio behind Sam & Max and Strong Bad's Cool Game for Attractive People.
Key features:
  • Interact with a charismatic cast of friends and foes
  • Embark on ambitious ventures with unexpected complications
  • Make (and break) a bevy of creative contraptions
  • Marvel at a beautifully rendered world
  • Play a brand new Wallace & Gromit episode each month (four in all)
31130.supported_languages: 英语 (full audio), 法语 (Subtitles), 德语  (Subtitles), 意大利语  (Subtitles), 西班牙语 - 西班牙  (Subtitles)
